sections.heading: Definitions
sections.text: 600.041 Definitions.—As used in this act, the following terms have the following meanings:

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this act, the following terms have the following meanings:(1)“Department” means the Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
sections.text: (2)“Person” means an individual, partnership, corporation, association, business trust, legal representative, or any organized group of individuals.(3)“Citru
